import React from 'react' import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import products from '../products' import {Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Button} from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' const ProductScreen = () => { const {id: productId } = useParams() const product = products.find((p) =>p._id === productId) console.log(product) return ( <> Go back

{product.name}

Price: {product.price}

Price: {product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0? 'Available':'Out of Stock'} ) } export default ProductScreen
